item.title: Make a admin 126
item.dc:creator: @r3d_th3m3 r3d_th3m3
item.description:
@r3d_th3m3 wrote:

[quote=“openice123, post:4, topic:196326”]eww gross commands

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) // command { // start of command for (int i = 0; i <= 21; i++) // loops through skill { // start of loop addSkillXP(119280000, i); // adds exp for all 21 skills the loop goes thro } // end of loop sendMessage("Maxed yourself"); // kept out side of loop so it does not say "Maxed yourself" 21 times refreshSkills(); // refreshes your current skill status } // end of command[/quote]
he would have to make his own refreshSkills boolean

item.title: Make a admin 126
item.dc:creator: @Jpspkz Jpspkz
item.description:
@Jpspkz wrote:

Um, if you can’t add master cause you dont know wear yet, um. Go into the character file, and make it like this:[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 14000000 character-skill = 1 99 14000000 character-skill = 2 99 14000000 character-skill = 3 99 14000000 character-skill = 4 99 14000000 character-skill = 5 99 14000000 character-skill = 6 99 14000000 character-skill = 7 99 14000000 character-skill = 8 99 14000000 character-skill = 9 99 14000000 character-skill = 10 99 14000000 character-skill = 11 99 14000000 character-skill = 12 99 14000000 character-skill = 13 99 14000000 character-skill = 14 99 14000000 character-skill = 15 99 14000000 character-skill = 16 99 14000000 character-skill = 17 99 14000000 character-skill = 18 99 14000000 character-skill = 19 99 14000000 character-skill = 20 99 14000000 character-skill = 21 99 14000000 character-skill = 22 99 14000000 character-skill = 23 99 14000000 character-skill = 24 99 14000000[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 12:00:35 PM[/size][hr][quote=“catthoor, post:3, topic:196326”]paste this in client.java for master =P

} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(119280000, 0); addSkillXP(119280000, 1); addSkillXP(119280000, 2); addSkillXP(119280000, 3); addSkillXP(119280000, 4); addSkillXP(119280000, 5); addSkillXP(119280000, 6); addSkillXP(119280000, 7); addSkillXP(119280000, 8); addSkillXP(119280000, 9); addSkillXP(119280000, 10); addSkillXP(119280000, 11); addSkillXP(119280000, 12); addSkillXP(119280000, 13); addSkillXP(119280000, 14); addSkillXP(119280000, 15); addSkillXP(119280000, 16); addSkillXP(119280000, 17); addSkillXP(119280000, 18); addSkillXP(119280000, 19); addSkillXP(119280000, 20); addSkillXP(119280000, 21); addSkillXP(119280000, 22); addSkillXP(119280000, 23); sendMessage("::yell"+ playerName +" got nice stats =P."); [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 11:56:28 AM[/size][hr]lol i was to slow -.-
but whit u its all skills, whit me its all =P[/quote]
Uhh yeah? its: sendMessagetoall("+playername+" got nice stats =P.")

item.title: Make a admin 126
item.dc:creator: @Leecher_Ian Leecher Ian
item.description:
@Leecher_Ian wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); sendMessage("" + playerName + " .. your a nerd."); }

and

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("N33b!."); }
